    • Method Detail

      • navigateToPage

        @Given(value="^I am on the \"(.*)\" (?:page|screen)$")
 @When(value="^(?:I |)go to the \"(.*)\" (?:page|screen)$")
public void navigateToPage(java.lang.String name)
                                                                                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Navigates to some specific page. Page name is defined by page alias. The navigation is performed by calling Page.navigate() method for specific page.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the page to navigate to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception related to data conversion or null value

      • verifyCurrentPage

        @Then(value="^I should see the \"(.*)\" (?:page|screen)$")
public void verifyCurrentPage(java.lang.String name)
                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Verified that the page specified by the name is current. Actually, it is wrapper of Page.isCurrent() method call.
        Parameters:
        name - the page name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception related to data conversion or null value.

      • acceptAlert

        @When(value="^(?:I |)accept the alert message$")
public void acceptAlert()
        Closes the alert message.

      • verifyTextPresent

        @Then(value="^(?:I should see |)the \"(.*)\" (?:text|label) is shown$")
public void verifyTextPresent(java.lang.String text)
        Verifies whether some text is shown on screen.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to check.

      • verifyMultipleLabelsAvailability

        @Then(value="^(?:I should see |)the following labels are shown:$")
public void verifyMultipleLabelsAvailability(java.util.List<java.lang.String> elements)
        Verifies multiple labels presence. It will throw an assertion error as soon as at least one of the labels wasn't found during default timeout.
        Parameters:
        elements - the list of labels to check presence of.

      • populatePageWithData

        @When(value="^(?:I |)populate current page with the following data:$")
public void populatePageWithData(cucumber.api.DataTable data)
                                                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Populates current page with the data provided. All specified fields should have Edit#setText(String) method implemented.
        Parameters:
        data - the table containing field to fill and value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - either reflection problems (like access) or missing attributes.

      • pageContainsData

        @Then(value="^(?:I should see |)the page contains the following data:$")
public void pageContainsData(cucumber.api.DataTable data)
                                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Verifies that page contains some data. Each field has expected value defined which is compared to the actual field text.
        Parameters:
        data - the data table containing fields and expected values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - either reflection problems (like access) or missing attributes.

      • clickOnText

        @When(value="^(?:I |)click on the \"([^\"]*)\" (?:text|label)$")
public void clickOnText(java.lang.String message)
        Perform click on some specific label.
        Parameters:
        message - the text of the label to click on.
